feed.title: Immich Power Tools Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add External Immich URL Redirection via Environment Variable by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/25
  • Feat: Find and tag assets with missing locations by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/28
  • fix: removed thubmnail and preview paths by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/30

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.4.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.4.0

Bug Fixes

  • added authentication error message block (eb1b00e)
  • authentication fixes in proxies (1465486)
  • login and logout updates (30526e8)
  • login page cleanup (cb594bf)
  • minor auth fix (7078768)
  • minor design fix (0da9504)
  • proxy default header fix (2d2781b)
  • removed unused packages (62fc820)

Features

  • added api key notice in login (0f05914)
  • added logout and redirection to login after logout (6c625f1)
  • added more info to error messages (1013231)
  • setup auth flow to work in parallel with api key (5e71e1e)

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Updated readme for immich url by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/33
  • Update README.md by @ghostc0des in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/29
  • feat: added logout and redirection to login after logout by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/37
  • Feat: Authentication based on immich's existing credentials by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/36
  • ci: updated depenencies by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/38
  • fix: logout button design fix by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/39
  • fix: build fixes by @varun-raj in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/40

New Contributors

  • @ghostc0des made their first contribution in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/29

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.2
